amendment.description: An amendment numbered 45 printed in Part A of House Report 115-711 to enhance the Levee Safety Action Classification (LSAC) risk categorization tool, developed internally by the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers. It also supplements current duties by ensuring that individual levee system LSAC ratings are transparent.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Weber (TX) amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A044) offered by Mr. Weber (TX).
